### Tender Description

The Canadian government is seeking an experienced contractor to design, build, and operate a Global Atmosphere Watch Observatory in Alert, Nunavut. The contractor will be responsible for ensuring the continued success of the atmospheric measurement programs and monitoring network conducted at this site. This procurement is subject to the Nunavut Agreement and includes socio-economic provisions regarding Inuit employment and subcontracting opportunities.

*   **UNSPSC:** 80161600 (Business facilities oversight), 81141800 (Facilities management)
*   **Trade Agreements:** None

*   **Sections 16.6 (Commercial and Industrial Benefits) and 16.7 (Community Benefits) of the Industrial Benefits Policy** apply to this procurement.
